name: WKCrownSequencer
desc: An object that reports the current state of the digital crown, including its rotational speed when it is in motion.

items.name: var rotationsPerSecond: Double
items.desc: The rotational speed of the crown, measured in rotations per second.

items.name: var isIdle: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the crown is at rest.

items.name: var delegate: WKCrownDelegate?
items.desc: The object you use to monitor changes to the crown state.

items.name: func focus()
items.desc: Begins the delivery of crown events to the current crown sequencer.

items.name: func resignFocus()
items.desc: Ends the delivery of crown events to the current crown sequencer.

items.name: var isHapticFeedbackEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the crown sequencerâ€™s haptic feedback is enabled.
